azurerm_cdn_profile.description: Manages a CDN Profile to create a collection of CDN Endpoints.

name.description: Specifies the name of the CDN Profile. Changing this forces a

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

sku.description: The pricing related information of current CDN profile. Accepted values are `Standard_Akamai`, `Standard_ChinaCdn`, `Standard_Microsoft`, `Standard_Verizon` or `Premium_Verizon`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the CDN Profile.

create.description: Used when creating the CDN Profile.

update.description: Used when updating the CDN Profile.

read.description: Used when retrieving the CDN Profile.

delete.description: Used when deleting the CDN Profile.
